articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Recoilless Gun Firing Contest of KPA Sub-units
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Recoilless Gun Firing Contest of KPA Units
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, guided a recoilless gun firing contest of units directly under first infantry divisions in echelon formation of KPA frontline corps.
					 He was greeted on the spot by Army General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff; Army Col. Gen. So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces; Army Lieut. Gen. Kim Chun Sam, first vice-chief and director of the Operational Bureau of the KPA General Staff; and Army Lieut. Gen. Yun Yong Sik, director of the Artillery Bureau of the KPA General Staff.
					
					 Taking part in the contest were units directly under the first infantry divisions in echelon formation of KPA 1st, 2nd and 5th Corps.
					
					 After hearing a report on the form and way of the contest by the officer in charge of training, the supreme commander issued an order to start the contest.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the success of soldiers of the Seoul Guards 3rd Infantry Division of the 2nd Corps, who destroyed the pillbox in a distance of 1 500m even under unexpected conditions.
					
					 The contest demonstrated the fighting spirit of the ever-victorious powerful Paektusan revolutionary army.
					
					 The above-said division took the special place in the contest. The 2nd Corps came first in the corps standing, the Seoul Guards 3rd Infantry Division of the 2nd Corps in the division standing, and the unit directly under the 25th Infantry Division of the 5th Corps in the artillery unit standing.
					
					 A diploma of crack-shot was conferred on the winning unit and crack-shot medals and badges on successful soldiers.
					
					 The supreme commander personally awarded a diploma of crack-shot to the Seoul Guards 3rd Infantry Division and crack-shot medals and badges to its soldiers.
					
					 The crack-shot diploma, medal and badge are the most precious gift of loyalty the service personnel present to the country and people, he said, adding that the first master gunners for 2015 emerged from the unit where the spirit of a-match-for-a-hundred came into being and that they are entitled to return to their unit, loudly singing the "Song of Pride of Guards Unit".
					
					 The Seoul Guards 3rd Infantry Division of the 2nd Corps fought brave battles for the party, revolution, country and people in the last Fatherland Liberation War, he said, urging its soldiers to keep on glorifying the honor of guards unit, inheriting the tradition of their forerunners, and intensify the movement for becoming crack-shots true to the intention of the party.
					
					 Then, he posed for a picture with service personnel of the Seoul Guards 3rd Infantry Division.
					
					 He said: As training the soldiers to be crack-shots is a fatal problem concerning the destiny of the country, the party initiated the movement for becoming crack-shots. This movement serves as a turning point and landmark in increasing the military strength. The military-political work should be oriented to making the movement become one for the sake of soldiers.
					
					 He called for intensifying the military drills in the new year, too, and decisively raising the quality of training.
					
					 Accompanying him were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau; Army General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces; Col. Gen. Yun Tong Hyon, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces; Senior Vice Admiral Kim Myong Sik, commander of the KPA Navy; Col. Gen. Choe Yong Ho, commander of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force; and O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang, Ri Pyong Chol and Kim Yo Jong, leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: NDC of DPRK Notifies U.S. Administration of Its Principled Stand
articles.content:
NDC of DPRK Notifies U.S. Administration of Its Principled Stand
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. ruling forces are more persistently resorting to their harsh policy hostile to the DPRK. 
					 Typical of its hostile policy is that U.S. President Obama slapped "high-profile additional sanctions" against major institutions and bodies and individuals of the DPRK from the outset of the new year and issued a "presidential administrative order" for enforcing them.
					
					 As regards the historic measures declared by the DPRK for improving the inter-Korean ties and creating a peaceful environment on the Korean Peninsula, the U.S. authorities have already begun talking rubbish, blustering that the U.S. should not react to them with payment of excessive expenses. They are openly revealing their ulterior intention, asserting that the relations should be improved on the premise that the north shall make a sincere change in its attitude towards the denuclearization.
					
					 The Policy Department of the NDC of the DPRK in its statement on Jan. 7 notifies the Obama Administration of its following principled stand as it is pushing the DPRK-U.S. relations to the worst phase of confrontation from the outset of the year:
					
					 Firstly, the U.S. should lift all unreasonable "sanctions" against the DPRK in all fields. 
					
					 We have taken this stand because all "sanctions" the U.S. has imposed against the DPRK so far are based on the inveterate hostility and repugnancy towards it and Washington's hostile policy towards it. This is also because "sanctions" were invented under absurd pretexts and conditions.
					
					 The U.S. should know that such tragicomedy as issuing the above-said order over the case without any sure ground would only bring bitterer disgrace and shame to it.
					
					 Secondly, the U.S., availing itself of this opportunity, should make a bold decision to unconditionally stop all reckless hostile acts of creating the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. should properly know that its attempt to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and bring down its dignified social system by force of arms will never come true.
					
					 The U.S. should make a bold decision to stop all hostile actions, if it does not want to follow in the footsteps of preceding U.S. warmongers who confessed after drinking a bitter cup of defeat that they fought a wrong war against a wrong rival at a wrong time and in a wrong place.
					
					 Thirdly, the U.S. should not forget even a moment that the army and people of the DPRK have already launched the toughest counteraction. 
					
					 We have already declared the toughest counteraction against the outrageous hostile acts the U.S. has perpetrated against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. took part in wars of aggression, big and small, including two world wars. But it has never experienced a hail of bullets and shells on its own territory.
					
					 The U.S. should roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK of its own accord if it does not want to suffer a war disaster.
					
					 One is bound to go to ruin if one fails to understand one's rival and one's own position.
					
					 We will closely follow the U.S. policy switchover.

articles.title: NDC Spokesman Urges S. Korean Authorities to Clarify Stand on Improving North-South Relations
articles.content:
NDC Spokesman Urges S. Korean Authorities to Clarify Stand on Improving North-South Relations
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Talking about "sincerity of the New Year address of the north", politicians of south Korea have described the DPRK's historic appeal as an "attempt to embrace the south aimed at breaking down south Korea-U.S. cooperation" and a "dialogue offensive to get rid of the international pressure".
					 Worse still, they estimated the U.S. "high-profile additional sanctions" against the DPRK as "proper counteraction" and again prodded the human scum into scattering anti-DPRK leaflets in frontline area for confrontation.
					
					 Under the prevailing situation, a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission on Wednesday issued the following statement urging the south Korean authorities to clarify their stand on some problems:
					
					 Firstly, do the south Korean authorities have an idea to bring about a great change in the north-south relations through dialogue, negotiation, exchange and contact or to persist in the confrontational racket such as leaflet scattering?
					
					 What matters is the fact that they still claim they can hardly stop such confrontational racket conducted under their jurisdiction on the pretexts of "freedom of expression, characteristics of social system and absence of legal grounds".
					
					 The south Korean authorities should make clear their stand on whether they will choose dialogue or confrontation.
					
					 Secondly, do they intend to create a peaceful environment on the Korean Peninsula or to go on escalating the tension?
					
					 Instead of responding to the DPRK's peaceful call for a halt to the joint military rehearsals staged in league with outside forces, the south Korean military has declared from the outset of the new year the continuation of nuclear war exercises against the DPRK, asserting that the rehearsals would go on to keep their combat capabilities as long as "south Korea-U.S. alliance" exists.
					
					 The chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of the south Korean army flew into the sky over the southwestern territorial waters, sensitive hotspot, by a fighter, blustering that "if the north provokes, the south will not hesitate to punish it mercilessly." 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clarify their stand on whether they intend to create a peaceful environment or go on escalating the tension.
					
					 Thirdly, do they have a will to achieve the great unity and cohesion in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself or to resort to the moves for "unification of social systems" and "confrontation of social systems"?
					
					 In south Korea, politicians and even the authorities are scheming to subordinate the dialogue and contacts for national reunification to the materialization of the present chief executive's "doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification".
					
					 Such nonsense as "Let us achieve unification under the system of liberal democracy at the risk of our lives in 2015" is heard from them, and the minister of Unification went the lengths of calling in a public appearance for the "south-led unification".
					
					 The present chief executive of south Korea did not hesitate to contend that the north should be led to make a "meaningful change" in 2015 without fail.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should have a clear understanding of the DPRK's resolution and will reflected in the positive call for writing a new history of the north-south relations. 
					
					 The DPRK will watch the future movement of the south Korean authorities with vigilance.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to ANC of South Africa
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to ANC of South Africa
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to the National Executive Committee of the African National Congress (ANC) of South Africa on the occasion of the 103rd anniversary of its foundation.
					 The message wished the ANC of South Africa greater success in its work for strengthening the party and achieving the national unity and the prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties will grow stronger.

articles.title: Members of Young Vanguard and Women Meet to Vow to Implement Their New Year Tasks
articles.content:
Members of Young Vanguard and Women Meet to Vow to Implement Their New Year Tasks
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Members of the young vanguard and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) separately held meetings Wednesday to vow to implement the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address. 
					 The meeting of members of the young vanguard took place at the Youth Park Open-Air Theatre while the meeting of the members of the DWUK was held at the Hall of Women.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's New Year address deeply moves all the service personnel and people across the country.
					
					 They called for building more monumental edifices in the era of Workers' Party by raising a strong wind of creating the Korean speed and making every construction site for building a thriving nation alive with a drive for patriotism, loyalty, creation and innovations.
					
					 They renewed their will to invariably hold up President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the sun of Juche, staunchly championing and adding eternal brilliance to their immortal revolutionary exploits. 
					
					 They stressed the need to consolidate the youth league and women's union to be Songun revolutionary organizations sharing the same idea, breathing the same breath and taking pace with the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) by steadily intensifying the work for establishing the monolithic leadership system of the party, true to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The meetings were attended by Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, officials of the youth league and the DWUK, officials concerned, youth and students and members of the DWUK.

articles.title: Provincial Mass Rallies Held
articles.content:
Provincial Mass Rallies Held
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies of South Phyongan, South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces took place on Wednesday to implement to the letter the tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for 2015.
					 The reporters and speakers said that his New Year address serves as a militant banner which helps win victories on all fronts for defending socialism and building a thriving nation in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 Last year was a year of proud victories in which the invincible might of the country was fully demonstrated in building a thriving nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, they noted.
					
					 All victories and precious achievements made last year are a brilliant fruition of the extraordinary wisdom and distinguished leadership ability of Kim Jong Un and devoted efforts of all party members and other people who are rallied close around the party, they stressed.
					
					 They called upon all officials, party members and other people to dynamically advance toward the grand October celebrations, holding high the slogan "Let us all turn out in the general offensive to hasten final victory in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu!" 
					
					 They stressed that no force on earth can check the advance of our army and people who are rushing forward under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un, holding high the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and final victory undoubtedly belongs to us.
					
					 The rallies were attended by officials of local party, power and economic bodies and working people's organizations and officials, workers and young people of industrial establishments, farms and universities.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK has brought out new stamps (four individuals) featuring the Masikryong Ski Resort.
					 Carried in the stamps are pictures of ski slopes, general view of the Masikryong Hotel, skiers and children riding sled.
					
					 The resort, opened on December 31, Juche 102 (2013), has become one of destinations for ski fans and other people in this winter season.

articles.title: Creation of Literary Works Brisk
articles.content:
Creation of Literary Works Brisk
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Writers of the DPRK are going to realities to create works in hearty response to the New Year address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 They have created at least 200 works.
					
					 At the beginning of the new year writers of the C.C., the Writers Union of Korea went to the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the East Pyongyang Thermal Power Station and other units of the capital city. They handed aid materials to workers and conducted frontline-style information service and agitation. They created works representing the breath of the times and strong in appeal.
					
					 Highly appreciated by the masses were poems reflecting the sky-high spirit of the service personnel and people all out in the general offensive for final victory full of conviction in sure victory.
					
					 Writers of North Hamgyong, South Phyongan and other provinces went to the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Chollima Steel Complex, the Chonsong Youth Coal Mine and other industrial establishments have also registered successes in creating works among workers.
					
					 Dozens of short poems created by them encouraged party members and other people.

articles.title: Another Outdoor Sporting Ground Appears in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Another Outdoor Sporting Ground Appears in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- A new outdoor sporting ground was recently completed at the Fitness Center in Thongil Street, Pyongyang.
					 It has a soccer field and basketball, volleyball, tennis and badminton courts, a roller-skating ground with 19 courses, a video game room and  a stand with 1,000 seats, covering more than 15,000 square meters.
					
					 Large lighting apparatuses installed in different parts of the ground makes it possible to conduct nighttime sports activities.
					
					 The ground is surrounded by more than 1,000 trees of good species and lawn.

articles.title: New Health Drink Developed
articles.content:
New Health Drink Developed
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Central Measuring Science Institute of the DPRK has recently developed a health drink, nano activated water.
					 The drink is very rich in essential microelements like zinc, iodine, iron, copper, silver, etc.
					
					 A series of clinical demonstrations proved that the drink is efficacious against diseases for its antibiotic effects and good for postoperative health recovery.
					
					 It already won high appraisal at the 11th National Nano Sci-tech Presentation and Show.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korea to Clarify Its Stand toward North-South Relations
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korea to Clarify Its Stand toward North-South Relations
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Undesirable farces persist in south Korea still in the new year against the DPRK's goodwill and generosity for the improved north-south relations and the fellow countrymen's desire for national unity and reunification. 
					 On Jan. 5, human scum of the "movement for directly helping compatriots in the north", an organization of "defectors from the north", conducted the scattering of over 1.3 million leaflets slandering the dignity and social system of the DPRK toward its area from Cholwon, South Kangwon Province.
					
					 Such reckless act was done at a time when all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad were eagerly hoping to see the mended north-south relations and opening of a broad avenue for the independent reunification after receiving the patriotic New Year address of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. It is a blatant challenge to the DPRK's sincere stand and appeal for the improved north-south relations and national reunification and a last-ditch effort to obstruct the improvement of north-south relations and spoil an atmosphere of dialogue.
					
					 This confrontation deed was not committed by some human scum only but the U.S. and the right-wing conservative forces of south Korea are behind it.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that the U.S. has funded the human scum, who fled their home after committing all sorts of crimes, to conduct anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations since its military blackmail, political and diplomatic pressure, economic sanctions and other unprecedented obstructive moves didn't work on the DPRK advancing under the banner of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 At the beginning of the new year the U.S. announced additional sanctions on the DPRK to stand against the improvement of relations and dialogue between the north and the south of Korea. Not content with such measure, it prodded even the human scum into an anti-DPRK confrontation racket.
					
					 Those human scum live on the money paid by the U.S. in return for their shock-brigade role in its disgusting anti-DPRK moves, including the leaflet scattering. 
					
					 The south Korean regime, too, has connived at and incited the leaflet scattering by such outlaws, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The recent action in the Military Demarcation Line area, the biggest hotspot, would have been checked in advance if the south Korean authorities had done what it should do. But, they remained an onlooker to this reckless leaflet scattering that was strongly opposed even by local inhabitants.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have repressed people of different social strata, critical of them including the chief executive, by invoking various "laws" but overlooked the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering by the human scum under the pretext of "freedom of expression" and the like. This is a self-contradictory behavior.
					
					 Conniving at a crime precisely means conspiracy with it. The south Korean regime's attitude towards the recent leaflet-scattering operation clearly proved that it is on the same boat with the human scum.
					
					 It is the demand of the DPRK that the north and the south of Korea stop fighting each other and share one purpose and join efforts in order to write a new history of their relations. However, the south Korean regime reacted to this just demand and call with confrontation moves, which fully reveals that "dialogue" and "improved relations" much touted by it are nothing but empty words.
					
					 As already declared, the DPRK will never pardon any reckless action of insulting its social system, the life and soul and dignity of its people.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not forget the fact that last year the atmosphere of dialogue, created with Inchon visit by the director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army and his party as a momentum, was spoiled due to the human scum's leaflet scattering, consequently driving the north-south relations to an uncontrollable phase.
					
					 The north-south relations can be hardly improved by one side's efforts alone.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clarify the stand on the north-south relations--whether they will push the relations again to a catastrophic phase by conniving at the reckless acts of a handful of the living corpse or come out with sincerity for their improvement and dialogue.
					
					 We will follow the developments for the future.

articles.title: Creation of Peaceful Climate Is Required by Present Inter- Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Creation of Peaceful Climate Is Required by Present Inter- Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- It is the most urgent requirement for the relaxation of the tension and peace between the north and south and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations to defuse the danger of war, de-escalate the tension and create a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday says this in an article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Large-scale war maneuvers are ceaselessly being staged in south Korea every year. They are the root cause of escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula and bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the nation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should show its clear attitude toward the improvement of the north-south relations in practice.
					
					 In order to mend the catastrophic inter-Korean relations and end the history of confrontation, they should put an end to all the war maneuvers including reckless military exercises in league with foreign forces and choose the way to defuse the tension and create a peaceful climate on the peninsula.
					
					 To eliminate the danger of war, defuse the tension and create the peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula is the job to be done by the authorities of the north and the south only. It is the crucial historic task to be fulfilled by all Koreans.
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad should turn out as one in the nation-wide struggle for defusing the danger of war, de-escalating the tension and creating the peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula to certainly open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in this significant year of the 70th anniversary of national liberation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces EU's Conspiracy in U.S. Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces EU's Conspiracy in U.S. Human Rights Abuses
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) --More facts about Europe's zealous conspiracy in the U.S. human rights abuses are disclosed one after another. The former UK prime minister and foreign secretary were regularly briefed on the operation of the CIA's secret prisons overseas by MI6 and, therefore, they were aware of all details.
					 The former Polish president who strongly denied the existence of CIA's secret prison admitted that he personally allowed its operation under the U.S. pressure.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 All these facts irrefutably prove that European countries are behaving mischievously to please the U.S.
					
					 The EU has long made double talks, depending on time and circumstances in dealing with human rights issues and enforced prejudiced and selective policies, toeing the U.S. line. This finds a vivid expression in Europe's policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Once the EU had a strong say towards the U.S., claiming its crucial role in the world. But the EU, a marionette of Washington, is now suffering shame as an accomplice in the latter's human rights abuses.  For this it has got no reward from the U.S.
					
					 Then there is a question about why the EU is now in such bad shape. This is because the EU has enforced the policy of following the U.S., bereft of its principle and its original position and stand, pressurized by the U.S. high-handed practices.
					
					 The EU has mistaken the U.S.  
					
					 The U.S. is by no means a strong entity. It is not the world where the U.S. is allowed to decide everything. The U.S. is on the decline as it is dregs of history with its fate sealed.
					
					 If European countries have normal thinking power, they should not be so mean as to please the U.S. but come to their senses to get trust from the international community and behave themselves from their fair stand, though belatedly. 
					
					 This is the only way for Europe to regain its prestige.

articles.title: Korean in Kyrgyzstan Vows to Contribute to Movement for National Reunification
articles.content:
Korean in Kyrgyzstan Vows to Contribute to Movement for National Reunification
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan, made public a statement calling for implementing to the letter the tasks for national reunification set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for 2015.
					 The tasks serve as important guidelines to be held high in the patriotic movement for reunification this year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, the statement said.
					
					 All Koreans should get united, turn out as one in the nationwide movement for national reunification and glorify this year as a year of great turn to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification, it noted, and continued:
					
					 The driving force of national reunification is all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad, and the country can be independently reunified in line with the interests and demand of the nation only when the stand of By Our Nation Itself is maintained.
					
					 We will wage a dynamic struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the reunification programmes common to the nation and landmarks of peace and prosperity in the new century.
					
					 We will make positive contributions to the reunification movement to briskly hold dialogue, negotiations and exchanges, make contacts to relink the severed ties and blood vessels of the nation and bring about a great turn in the north-south relations.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that the country will be certainly reunified thanks to the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for national reunification and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un despite whatever ordeals and difficulties that we may face in the way of national reunification.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Organization Calls for Bringing Second June 15 Era of Reunification
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Organization Calls for Bringing Second June 15 Era of Reunification
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement in support of the historic New Year address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The slogan "Let the whole nation join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in this year of the 70th anniversary of national liberation!" advanced by Kim Jong Un in his New Year address serves as the banner of struggle which clearly indicates the bright prospect and way of independent reunification to all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas, the statement said.
					
					 We should glorify this year as a year of great turn in opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification, it noted, and went on:
					
					 First of all, it is necessary to remove the danger of war, ease the tension and create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should discontinue at once large-scale war exercises which escalate tension on the peninsula and bring the danger of a nuclear war to hang over the heads of the Koreans.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should neither seek "unification of social systems" that incites distrust and conflict between the north and the south nor insult the other side's social system and solicit others to do harm to their fellow countrymen.
					
					 Nothing will be impossible if our nation shares one purpose and joins efforts. On the road for reunification the north and the south have got such charter and great programme for reunification as the July 4 joint statement, the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration which demonstrated to the whole world the nation's determination and mettle to reunify the country.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should conduct a more dynamic movement for national reunification in this significant year of the 70th anniversary of national liberation and the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and make a positive contribution to bringing about the second June 15 era of reunification.

articles.title: Reminiscences of Kim Il Sung Off Press in Brazil
articles.content:
Reminiscences of Kim Il Sung Off Press in Brazil
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The third volume of Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century," reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, was brought out by the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil on Dec. 31 last year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Feats Praised by Egyptian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Feats Praised by Egyptian Figure
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, contributed an article titled "Great men make history" to newspaper Al Ahrar on Dec. 30 last year on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The article said:
					
					 History of the people is made only by great men. If the people's dream is to come true, their struggle should be led by great men. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il conducted political, military and diplomatic activities by pursuing Songun politics and thus contain the enemy and won victory.
					
					 He regarded the people as the most valuable being.
					
					 The world suffered the political upheavals in the 1990s when the Soviet Union was disorganized and socialist countries in East Europe collapsed.
					
					 When the DPRK was holding higher the banner of socialism, the U.S. openly revealed its hostility towards the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK had to overcome hardships due to economic difficulties, natural disasters of consecutive years and demise of President Kim Il Sung, the great loss to the Korean nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made a resolute decision to defend the revolution with arms.
					
					 He smashed all schemes of the U.S. by dint of his Songun politics.
					
					 But for its powerful defence capability, the DPRK would fall a prey to the U.S. 
					
					 The DPRK is unhesitatingly supporting the cause of the Arab people in the international arenas. 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un leading the DPRK is sending support and encouragement to the cause of the Egyptian leadership and people.
					
					 Friendship between Egypt and the DPRK will last.

articles.title: Peruvian Party Hails Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Peruvian Party Hails Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union on January 2 made public a statement in support of the New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Un in his address comprehensively clarified the tasks for the building of a thriving nation, national reunification and global independence and ways for implementing them. 
					
					 The contributions and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the Korean revolution and the future of reunified country will last forever, it said, and went on:
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un the party and people of the DPRK will steadily and dynamically advance toward final victory, fully demonstrating the invincible might in all fields of building of a thriving nation in this significant year of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 The Korean people will bring about a great turn in the struggle for reunification of the country and the nation, lifetime wishes of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, in this historic year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					
					 We reiterate the firm belief in the victory of the DPRK.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Introduces DPRK Socialist Constitution on Its Website
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Introduces DPRK Socialist Constitution on Its Website
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Socialist Constitution of DPRK" on its website on Dec. 30 last year.
					 The Socialist Constitution of the DPRK stipulates that the Juche idea and the Songun idea shall be the guiding principle for state activities, the article said, and continued:
					
					 The Socialist Constitution remarkably enhanced the authority of the National Defence Commission in the state machinery in line with the specific situation of the country and the requirements of the times.
					
					 Thus, the Korean people could have a sure legal guarantee to reliably protect the people-centered socialist system with arms in any severe circumstances and victoriously advance the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The Socialist Constitution also stipulates that to steadily improve the material and cultural living standards of the people shall be the supreme principle of state activities.
					
					 In actuality, the DPRK is championing the independent requirements and interests of the working masses and providing them with all living conditions to discharge its mission as a householder.
					
					 The Korean people are provided by the state all rights social beings can enjoy, including the rights to receive free education and free medical care.
					
					 The Socialist Constitution is a political charter which codifies all victories and successes scored by the Korean people in the revolution and construction under the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea and stipulates all principles to be adhered to in all fields of the social life, including politics, economy, culture and national defence, and important tasks in socialist construction.
					
					 It serves as the powerful driving force of the revolution and construction as it is the law of the people themselves, which is absolutely supported by them.

articles.title: Tajik, South African Political Figures Slam S. Korean Authorities for Politically-motivated Suppression
articles.content:
Tajik, South African Political Figures Slam S. Korean Authorities for Politically-motivated Suppression
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Tajik and South African political figures made public statements on December 30 last year in denunciation of the large political terrorist case in south Korea. 
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, in his statement said that the south Korean authorities brought the non-existent "human rights issue" of the north up for discussion at the UN but are turning their blind eyes to the heinous human rights abuses.
					
					 The world progressives and unbiased public opinion claim that the UN should take issue with the human rights abuses by the south Korean authorities and discussed them, he said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not talk about "human rights" of the north but make an apology before the international community for their heinous human rights abuses and be punished. 
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, said in his statement:
					
					 The south Korean authorities recently disbanded the Unified Progressive Party by branding it as "unconstitutional party following the north", forcibly linking the party's programme to the DPRK. This is a wanton violation of democracy and human rights and unprecedented politically-motivated terrorist act. 
					
					 We bitterly denounce the south Korean authorities for their reckless politically-motivated suppression and urge them to value justice and conscience and behave with reason.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de tiro de canon sin retroceso de subunidades de cuerpo de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de tiro de canon sin retroceso de subunidades de cuerpo de EPC
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio la competencia de tiro de canon sin retroceso de las subunidades adscritas directamente a las divisiones de infanteria de escalon de primera linea del cuerpo del frente del EPC.
					El fue acogido en el terreno por el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Gil,  jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres So Hong Chan, primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Kim Chun Sam, primer subjefe y director del buro de operaciones del EMG del EPC, y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Yun Yong Sik, director del buro de artilleria del EMG del EPC.
					
					En la competencia participaron las subunidades adscritas a las divisiones de infanteria de escalon de primera linea de primer, segundo y quinto cuerpos.
					
					Tras recibir del comandante de ejercicios el parte sobre la forma y el metodo de la competencia, el Comandante Supremo dio la orden de comienzo.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los artilleros de la Tercera Division Guardia de Infanteria "Seul" del segundo cuerpo del EPC acertaron en una situacion inesperada el blocao de ametralladora a mil 500 m de distancia.
					
					En la competencia, los participantes  demostraron la valentia y el temperamento de combate del poderoso ejercito del monte Paektu que siempre sale victorioso.
					
					En la ocasion ocupo el lugar especial la tercera division guardia de infanteria "Seul" del cuerpo de ejercito no.2.
					
					El segundo cuerpo ocupo primer lugar segun  orden a nivel de cuerpo, la tercera division guardia de infanteria del segundo cuerpo, segun orden a nivel de la division y la subunidad adscrita a la 25a division de infanteria del quinto cuerpo, segun orden a nivel de canon.
					
					A la unidad triunfadora se le dio el diploma de artillero certero, y a los militares sobresalientes, la medalla y la insignia de artillero certero.
					
					El Comandante Supremo otorgo a la sobresaliente tercera division guardia de infanteria "Seul" el diploma de artillero certero y a sus uniformados, la medalla y la insignia de artillero certero.
					
					Diciendo que el diploma, medalla e insignia de artillero certero son el mas noble regalo de fidelidad de los militares dedicado a la patria y al pueblo, enseno que los primeros artilleros certeros de 2015 nacieron en la unidad donde se creo el espiritu de uno contra cien enemigos y agrego que ellos pueden regresar a la unidad cantando en voz alta la "Cancion de orgullo de unidades guardias".
					
					Al recordar que la tercera division guardia de infanteria "Seul" del segundo cuerpo lucho con valentia en el periodo de la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria para defender el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo, enfatizo que los artilleros de la division deben glorificar sin cesar el honor de la division guardia continuando la  tradicion de los antecesores y anadio que para este fin, deben librar energicamente el movimiento por el tirador certero, guardando profundamente la voluntad del partido.
					
					El Mariscal se retrato con los uniformados de la tercera division guardia de infanteria "Seul" del segundo cuerpo del EPC.
					
					Preparar a los militares como tiradores y artilleros certeros es un asunto muy importante relacionado directamente con el destino de la patria, destaco y continuo que por eso, el partido dio la iniciativa del movimiento por el tirador certero y artillero certero, que servira de un motivo de viraje y jalon para el fortalecimiento del poderio militar. E indico que las labores militares y politicas deben  dirigirse a que este movimiento sea para los  militares.
					
					Instruyo que este ano tambien deben levantar mas furiosamente el fervor de ejercicios y mejorar considerablemente su calidad.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Yun Tong Hyon, viceministro de FAP, el coronel general de las fuerzas navales Kim Myong Sik, comandante de las fuerzas navales del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas aereas Choe Yong Ho, comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, y los cuadros directivos del CC del PTC, O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang, Ri Pyong Chol y Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Presidente del CC de PSDC exhorta a abrir ancho camino para reunificacion con fuerzas unidas
articles.content:
Presidente del CC de PSDC exhorta a abrir ancho camino para reunificacion con fuerzas unidas
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- En su declaracion fechada 5, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea subrayo que la consigna y los proyectos de la reunificacion de la patria, presentados por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo, son mas realistas y racionales que permiten resolver el problema de relaciones intercoreanas.
					Si todos los coreanos se levantan como un solo hombre en la campana patriotica de la reunificacion en pleno acato al mensaje del Ano Nuevo pronunciado por el Mariscal, se mejoraran las empeoradas relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas, se abrira un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente y se hara gran aporte a la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el mundo, senalo la nota y continuo:
					
					El PSDC exhorta a todos los partidos politicos y politicos del Sur de Corea a tener presente el noble proposito del Mariscal de escribir nueva historia de las relaciones N-S, liberarse de la concepcion de enfrentar los regimenes, inutil para la reunificacion de la patria, y tomar parte activa en la corriente pannacional para abrir un ancho camino de la reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben abandonar su intencion de "reunificacion de regimen" que motiva la desconfianza y los conflictos entre ambas partes y dejar de calumniar el sistema de otra parte, visitar y pedir ayuda a otros paises para denigrar a sus compatriotas, poner fin a la represion contra las fuerzas patrioticas de la reunificacion y prestar atencion a la realizacion conjunta de los programas comunes de reunificacion nacional entre otros los 3 Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, las historicas declaraciones del 15 de Junio y 4 de Octubre.
					
					Estados Unidos, el autor de la separacion de nuestra nacion que nos causa grandes sufrimientos desde hace 70 anos, debe abandonar su anacronica politica de enemistad y descabelladas acciones de agresion contra Corea y tomar una audaz opcion de cambio de su politica.

articles.title: Sur de Corea debe dejar en claro su posicion: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Sur de Corea debe dejar en claro su posicion: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- Al igual que el ano pasado, continuan en el Sur de Corea las acciones contrarias a la buena voluntad y magnanimidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de mejorar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y a la aspiracion de toda la nacion coreana a la reconciliacion y la reunificacion.
					El dia 5, en los alrededores de Cholwon de la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea, los fulanos y menganos del "movimiento por la ayuda directa a los compatriotas norcoreanos", entidad de "fugitivos norcoreanos", lanzaron hacia la parte nortena mas de un millon 300 mil volantes que ofenden la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Esta accion de guerra psicologica se cometio justamente cuando todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar recibieron el patriotico mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y desean la mejora de las empeoradas relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y abrir un ancho camino de la reunificacion independiente. Por eso, deviene el desafio frontal al llamamiento de la RPDC sobre la mejora de las relaciones N-S y la reunificacion de la patria y el ultimo coletazo para impedir la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y echar a perder el ambiente de dialogo entre si.
					
					El presente caso no es acto independiente de una chusma sino se cometio bajo el control trasero de Estados Unidos y las fuerzas conservadoras derechistas surcoreanas.
					
					EE.UU. recurrio al chantaje militar, presion politica y diplomatica, sancion economica y otros metodos para aplastar a la RPDC. Impotente de hacerlo, emplea en el lanzamiento de volantes a las escorias humanas que huyeron de la RPDC tras cometer crimenes.
					
					A principios del ano nuevo, EE.UU. publico la medida de sancion adicional contra la RPDC negando abiertamente la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y el dialogo N-S. 
					
					Por su parte, la chusma, movilizada en el lanzamiento de volantes, mantienen su sucia vida con el dinero que se le paga por la campana anti-RPDC.
					
					Tambien, las autoridades surcoreanas se suman a la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU. amparando a esa chusma.
					
					Si ellas hubieran hecho lo que les toca hacer, se habria prevenido el lanzamiento de volantes cometido en las cercanias de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar, zona mas candente, a pesar del fuerte rechazo de los habitantes locales.
					
					En virtud de las "leyes" de toda indole, las autoridades surcoreanas reprimen a todos los que critican a ellas mismas, inclusive la mandataria. Pero, bajo el pretexto de "libertad de expresion" hacen vista gorda del lanzamiento de volantes contra la RPDC, lo que es acto contradictorio y traidor.
					
					Tolerar el acto criminal es igual a confabularse con el delincuente.
					
					El comportamiento de las autoridades surcoreanas, quienes respondieron con las maniobras conflictivas al llamamiento justo de la parte connacional a escribir con las fuerzas unidas la nueva historia de relaciones intercoreanas sin disputas entre ambas partes coreanas, demuestra claramente que el "dialogo" y la "mejora de relaciones" de que hablan ellas son palabras vacias.
					
					Como ya ha declarado, la RPDC no perdonara jamas el insulto y calumnia a su regimen y sistema, considerados como vida y dignidad.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben olvidar el hecho de que debido al lanzamiento de volantes cometido el ano pasado, se ha roto la atmosfera del dialogo, preparada dificilmente gracias a la visita a Inchon de la comitiva del jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea de la RPDC, y se llevaron las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase irreparable.
					
					No se puede mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas con los esfuerzos unilaterales de una parte.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben dejar en claro su posicion ante esta disyuntiva: llevar otra vez las relaciones N-S a la fase catastrofica tolerando las locuras de las escorias humanas o proceder sinceramente al mejoramiento de relaciones y al dialogo con el Norte.
					
					La RPDC observara la situacion posterior.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por crear ambiente pacifico en Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por crear ambiente pacifico en Peninsula Coreana
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- Eliminar el peligro de guerra, aliviar la tension y preparar un ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana es la demanda mas apremiante para eliminar la tension, preservar la paz y mejorar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este miercoles y continua:
					
					Los ejercicios belicos de gran envergadura que se desarrollan incesantemente en el Sur de Corea resultan causa raigal de la agravacion de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y el peligro de guerra nuclear.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben mostrar con sus acciones la posicion sobre la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Para salvar las empeoradas relaciones Norte-Sur y acabar con la historia de confrontacion las autoridades surcoreanas deben parar todas las maniobras belicas incluso los imprudentes ejercicios militares que se libran en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras y optar el camino de distension y el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Esto no se corresponde a las autoridades de ambas partes coreanas sino a toda la nacion coreana. 
					
					Todos los coreanos en el interior y exterior del pais deben levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha pannacional para eliminar el peligro de guerra, aliviar la tension y preparar el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana para abrir el ancho camino por la reunificacion independiente en este ano significativo del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria.
